definition[0]: to get rid of something that you do not want or need
example[1]: I shouldn’t have thrown away the receipt.
definition[1]: to spend money in a way that is not sensible
example[2]: I can’t afford to throw money away.
definition[2]: to waste something good that you have, for example a skill or an opportunity
example[3]: This could be the best chance you’ll ever have. Don’t throw it away!
